com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.jobs

Class JobsAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.jobs.JobsAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=S3FileTransferProperties.class)
public class JobsAutoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for Jobs Setup and Run.

    3.0.0
